motivational_quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational_quotes.author: Steve Jobs

motivational_quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

motivational_quotes.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
motivational_quotes.author: Helen Hayes

motivational_quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
motivational_quotes.author: Aristotle

study_tips.tip: Use the Pomodoro Technique: 25 minutes of focused study, then a 5-minute break.
Create mind maps to visualize connections between concepts.
Teach someone else what you've learned - it reinforces your understanding.
Use spaced repetition to review material at increasing intervals.
